name: Agile Stance
desc: You take on a stance focused on mobility, intent on covering ground quickly.
effects: **Nimble:** Attacks made as a part of [_Punish_] _Reactions_ have _Disadvantage_ against you.

abilities.name: Dart
abilities.effect: You may immediately _Move_ as if it was your _Turn_, and may use _Mobility_ _Maneuvers_ as if it was your turn.

name: Rallying Stance
desc: You adopt a supportive stance, focusing on helping allies while catching your breath.
effects: **Encouragement:** At _Refresh_ you may use up to 2 _Momentum_ of [_Inspiring_] Manuevers as if it was your _Turn_, paying no costs.

abilities.name: Rally
abilities.effect:
Choose one:
* You or the Target _Recovers_.
* You or the Target clears 5 _Stun_.

If you target an ally, you may also clear 1 _Stun_.

adjust_notes: 2 free Momentum, minus a bit for Pacifist.

name: Hostile Stance
desc: A stance focused on overwhelming offense and unleashing a barrage of attacks.
effects: **Hostility:** You may use any number of Attacks on your _Turn_.
**Aggression:** Your first Attack on your _Turn_ gains [_Discount_ 2].

abilities.name: Press
abilities.effect: After resolving all other effects, inflict 3 _Stun_ as a separate effect. If you _Missed_, instead deal 4 _Stun_.

adjust_notes: Gets 2 Momentum for attacks, toss in another 1 for Hostility.

name: Open Stance
desc: A perfectly balanced stance, leaving no obvious openings while granting no obvious advantages.

name: Focused Stance
desc: You adopt a patient stance, gathering your energy to unleash a powerful effect.
effects: **Charge:** At the start of the _Round_, choose an Ability and any Target for it, announcing both to the table. On your Turn, if you use the chosen Ability against the chosen Target add [_Discount_ 6].
**Limited Mobility:** You may not willingly spend Movement until your _Turn_. On your _Turn_, you may not leave your current _Arena_ until the chosen Ability has been used.
adjust_notes: Charge is very good, but Limited Mobility is very bad.

name: Guarded Stance
desc: A stance focused on defense, providing an unparalleled ability to keep yourself safe.
effects: **Active Defense:** One _Defensive_ _Reaction_ you use each _Phase_ gains [_Discount_ 1].
**Defensive Focus:** Attacks against creatures that have not attacked you this _Round_ have _Disadvantage_.

abilities.name: Raise Guard
abilities.effect: Choose an enemy. You have _Advantage_ on all _Defense Rolls_ against them this _Phase_.

adjust_notes: Assumes Active Defense triggers every other phase, with a little extra for Raise Guard.
